abstract: The tide in Europe is running against Germany and toward a weaker European Central Bank, two economists write.
snippet: The tide in Europe is running against Germany and toward a weaker European Central Bank, two economists write.
lead_paragraph: Peter Boone is chairman of the charity Effective Intervention and a research associate at the Center for Economic Performance at the London School of Economics. He is also a director of Salute Capital Management Ltd. Simon Johnson is the Ronald A. Kurtz Professor of Entrepreneurship at the M.I.T. Sloan School of Management and former chief economist at the International Monetary Fund.

byline.original: By Simon Johnson and Peter Boone

abstract: The company’s chief financial officer told Wall Street analysts that it was stopping production on an animation film, and that summer ad revenue at ABC was softer than expected.
snippet: The company’s chief financial officer told Wall Street analysts that it was stopping production on an animation film, and that summer ad revenue at ABC was softer than expected.
lead_paragraph: James A. Rasulo, Disney’s chief financial officer, unexpectedly revealed two important tidbits at a gathering of Wall Street analysts on Thursday: The company will take a $50 million write-down at its movie studio, and summer advertising revenue at ABC was softer than expected.

headline.main: Disney Unexpectedly Reveals Movie Write-Down and Sluggish Ad Revenue

abstract: Sallie L. Krawcheck, a former Bank of America and Citigroup executive, discussed her concerns about the complexity of financial behemoths at a conference. “It makes you weep blood out of your eyes,” she said.
snippet: Sallie L. Krawcheck, a former Bank of America and Citigroup executive, discussed her concerns about the complexity of financial behemoths at a conference. “It makes you weep blood out of your eyes,” she said.
lead_paragraph: It’s still the talk of Wall Street: Are big banks too complex? And if so, what should be done?

headline.main: A Warning on Bank Complexity, From Someone Who Would Know
